Text:
Not tagged properly.   Both Album Artist and Artists tags show "VARIOUS"...we have no idea of who is singing what song.

Can't find this CD on CD Universe or Amazon either.
Play it in WMP. There it shows the artist 's name.
Thank you for adding the song playlist and artists names to the description!
Since this one, your very first UL, there have been lots of great ones to share with "music lovers".  Thank you for this timeless reunion.  Truly. /JR
